Room.Name: Reflecting Pool
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the most beautiful and serene part of the Garden.
Room.LongDescription: Great slabs of flat rock hang over a reflecting pool, while fruit trees are heavy with their perfect produce. Someone has lodged a keg of mild brandy into the bole of a walnut tree, and it seems to never empty. There are bright, sparkling points of light in the air. A bridge goes to the north.
